documentContextParameterType.title: Document Context_ Parameter. Details
documentContextParameterType.description: A feature that is fixed for a particular document context.

id.title: Document Context_ Parameter. Identification. Identifier
id.description: The unique identifier of this document context parameter.

exchangedDocumentContextType.title: Exchanged Document_ Context. Details
exchangedDocumentContextType.description: The scenario or setting of an exchanged document, such as its business process application context.

exchangedDocumentType.title: Exchanged_ Document. Details
exchangedDocumentType.description: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that is exchanged between two or more parties.

id.title: Exchanged_ Document. Identification. Identifier
id.description: The unique identifier of this exchanged document.

typeCode.title: Exchanged_ Document. Type. Code
typeCode.description: The code specifying the type of exchanged document.

statusCode.title: Exchanged_ Document. Status. Code
statusCode.description: The code specifying the status of this exchanged document.

issueDateTime.title: Exchanged_ Document. Issue. Date Time
issueDateTime.description: The date, time, date time or other date time value for the issuance of this exchanged document.

sender.title: Exchanged_ Document. Sender. Trade_ Party
sender.description: The party that sends this exchanged document.

issuer.title: Exchanged_ Document. Issuer. Trade_ Party
issuer.description: The party that issues this exchanged document.

recipient.title: Exchanged_ Document. Recipient. Trade_ Party
recipient.description: A trade party that receives this exchanged document.

seller.title: Header_ Trade Agreement. Seller. Trade_ Party
seller.description: The seller party for this header trade agreement.

buyer.title: Header_ Trade Agreement. Buyer. Trade_ Party
buyer.description: The buyer party for this header trade agreement.

relevant.title: Header_ Trade Agreement. Relevant. Trade_ Party
relevant.description: A relevant party for this header trade agreement.

inspectionResultCharacteristicType.title: Inspection Result_ Characteristic. Details

measuredValue.title: Inspection Result_ Characteristic. Measured_ Value. Text

applicableMethod.title: Inspection Result_ Characteristic. Applicable. Specified_ Method

inspectionStatusType.title: Inspection_ Status. Details

conditionCode.title: Inspection_ Status. Condition. Code
conditionCode.description: The code specifying this inspection status condition.

description.title: Inspection_ Status. Description. Text
